		#
		#	the essence
		#
		from goodest._essence import prepare_essence
		goodest_essence = prepare_essence ()
	
		#
		#	open the database
		#
		from goodest.monetary.ingredients.DB.open import open_DB
		open_DB (
			goodest_essence = goodest_essence
		)
		
		#
		#	connect to the database
		#
		import goodest.monetary.DB.open as ingredient_DB
		essential_nutrients_collection = ingredient_DB.connect (collection = "essential_nutrients")
		cautionary_ingredients_collection = ingredient_DB.connect (collection = "cautionary_ingredients")
		
		#
		#	add an ingredient
		#
		essential_nutrients_collection.insert_one ({
			"names": [
				"protein"
			],
			"accepts names": [],
			"includes": []	
		})
		
		essential_nutrients_collection.insert_one ({
			"names": [
				"carbohydrates"
			],
			"accepts names": [],
			"includes": []	
		})
		
		#
		#	create an index of ingredient names
		#
		
		
		#
		#	find an ingredient
		#	
		essential_nutrients_collection.find_one ({
			"names": [
				"protein"
			],
			"accepts names": [],
			"includes": []	
		})
